[ExtraVM](https://extravm.com) // Hello fellow lowenders. I have added a new discount to KVM VPS in CA/FR locations, if you need something with DDoS protection, please consider!  
  
Promotion: **1T8J5IO8IW** - 20% off recurring on NVMe KVM VPS. Stacks with billing cycle discounts.  
  
All servers come with DDoS protection (via OVH) and the following related features:  
- Enable/Disable Permanent Mitigation from client area  
- Enable/Disable/Modify Network Firewall from client area  
- Receive e-mail notifications when an attack is detected against an IP (optional, enabled by default)  
- Read more about these features: [DDoS Protection](https://extravm.com/billing/index.php/knowledgebase/71/How-Our-DDoS-Protection-Works.html) - [IP Management](https://extravm.com/billing/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/80/IP-Management.html')  
  
Other service features:  
- Manage rDNS entries from the client area  
- Updated KVM OS [templates](solusvm-kvm-templates.com), typically every 1-3 months  
- Request your own ISO to be mounted  
- No thin provisioning KVM disk  
- Fast Intel NVMe Solid State drives  
- Fast support and communication/credit with incidents
